sen.j: 故実に詳しく、元服について記した『冠儀浅寡抄』、笏について記した『畢用録』、高齢公卿の装束について記した『宿徳装束抄』、狩衣について記した『布衣群色便蒙抄』ほか著書は多い。
sen.e: He was well informed of ancient practices, and wrote many books including "Kangi Senka-sho" (冠儀浅寡抄), a study on genpuku (celebrate one's coming of age), "Hitsuyo-roku" (畢用録), a record for 笏scepters, "Shukutoku Shozoku-sho," a study on the costumes of elderly Kugyo (high court nobles), "Hoi Gunshoku Benmo-sho" (布衣群色便蒙抄), a study on the traditional hunting wears for court nobles.
sen.cmt: 『冠儀浅寡抄』 →正式な読み方が不明です："Kangi Senka-sho" (冠儀浅寡抄)としました。『畢用録』→正式な読み方が不明です："Hitsuyo-roku" (畢用録)としました。『宿徳装束抄』 →"Shukutoku Shozoku-sho"としました。『布衣群色便蒙抄』→正式な読み方が不明です："Hoi Gunshoku Benmo-sho" (布衣群色便蒙抄)としました。狩衣→定訳不明：traditional hunting wears for court nobles としました(布衣は、traditional everyday clothes for kugeという意味なので）。
sen.e: He was well informed of ancient practices, and wrote many books including "Kangi Senka-sho" (冠儀浅寡抄), a study on genpuku (celebrate one's coming of age), "Hitsuyo-roku" (畢用録), a record for scepters, "Shukutoku Shozoku-sho," a study on the costumes of elderly Kugyo (high court nobles), "Hoi Gunshoku Benmo-sho" (布衣群色便蒙抄), a study on the traditional hunting wears for court nobles.

sen.j: 『宿徳装束抄』や『布衣群色便蒙抄』には生地について近世の通説を疑う研究的態度が見られるなど、考証的志向がある。
sen.e: In "Shukutoku Shozoku-sho" and "Hoi Gunshoku Benmo-sho" (布衣群色便蒙抄), he demonstrated skepticism toward the premodern theories which had been commonly accepted until that time as a researcher, and this fact indicates that he was interested in studying historical evidence.
